ygData.subject: Re: Hail Megatron

Subject: Re: Hail Megatron
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron smiles from the turn of events. They are his now, and together,
they will conquer this world, he thinks to himself. He gets off of
Astroblast and Drag Strip, and motion for them to follow, and he flies off
the cliff, and lands in the middle of the Decepticons. "Motormaster, Status
report" he blurts without emotion.

Motormaster walks towards the group. "Mighty Megatron, our ship has a full
stack of Energon cubes for our disposal. Scourge, Cyclonus, Triggerhappy,
and the Terrorcons and Skullgrin are now part of the Decepticon troops,
loyal to you. That is Switchblade" he says, pointing to the small robot,
and then pointing to the Bodicons finishes, "and those are the Bodicons."

Megatron bends down, and picks up his fusion cannon. While hooking it back
up to his arm he starts. "Yes, I remember Cyclonus and Scourge, I saw you
work through Galvatron's eyes. You were loyal to him, can I count on that
kind of loyalty ?" he asks.
